description: The Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at the University of Arizona provides students with a deep foundation in programming, data structures, algorithms, and systems, preparing graduates for careers in software development, AI, and cybersecurity.

Understand computer organization and operating systems.

exit_points.description: Earned after completing CS fundamentals, Java, and data structures.
